description: This notification is generated whenever the free (unused) RAM goes
below threshold for this compute node.

event.Summary: Free RAM on compute node $v1 ($v4 kb) is below threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNMemoryLow JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysMemCapacity u 9999 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysMemUsed u 9999 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysMemFree u 9999 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysMemUsedPr i 0 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysSwapCapacity u 9999 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysSwapFree u 9999

description: Id of the Compute Node.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysId

description: The amount of RAM on the Compute Node, in kilo bytes. Zero if
information is unavailable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysMemCapacity

description: The amount of RAM used on the Compute Node, in kilo bytes. Zero
if information in unavailable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysMemUsed

description: The amount of RAM free on the Compute Node, in kilo bytes. Zero
if information in unavailable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysMemFree

description: The amount of RAM used on the Compute Node, in percentage. Zero
if information in unavailable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysMemUsedPr

description: Total swap space on the Compute Node, in kilo bytes. Zero if
information is unavailable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysSwapCapacity

description: The amout of swap space free on the Compute Node, in kilo bytes.
Zero if information is unavailable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysSwapFree

description: This notification is generated whenever the free (unused) RAM recovers
above threshold for this compute node and previously a
jnxJVAECNMemoryLow was reported.

event.Summary: Free RAM ($v4 kb) is above minimum threshold

description: This notification is generated whenever the overall system processing
load exceeds threshold.
Id of the Compute Node.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysId

description: Total processing load on the Compute Node, in percentage.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysProcessingLoad

description: This notification is generated whenever the overall system processing
load is within threshold and previously a jnxJVAECNProcessingLoadHigh
was reported.

event.Summary: System processing load ($v2 %) is within threshold

description: Id of the Compute Node.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysId

description: Total processing load on the Compute Node, in percentage.

description: This notification is generated whenever the load on a processor
exceeds threshold.

description: An unique identifier for the processor with this Compute Node.

description: Load on the processor, expressed in percentage. Zero if information
is unavailable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNProcessorLoad

description: This notification is generated whenever the load on a processor
is within threshold and previously a jnxJVAECNProcessorLoadHigh
was reported.

description: Load on the processor, expressed in percentage. Zero if information
is unavailable.

description: This notification is generated whenever network interface is down.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifDown JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifId i 9999 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifOperStatus i 0 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifAdminStatus i 0 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifLinkDetect i 1

description: Id of the Compute Node.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysId

description: An unique identifier for the network interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifId

description: Description of the interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifName

description: Operational state of the interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifOperStatus

description: Administrative state of the interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifAdminStatus

description: Link presence, True if present else False. This field is meaningless
when the interface is administered down.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifLinkDetect

description: This notification is generated whenever network interface is up and
previously a jnxJVAECNifDown was reported.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifUp JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifId i 9999 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifOperStatus i 0 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifAdminStatus i 0 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNifLinkDetect i 1

description: Link presence, True if present else False. This field is meaningless
when the interface is administered down.

description: This notification is generated whenever storage space falls below
threshold.

event.Summary: Storage space on mount point $v3 ($v6 kb) is below threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNStorageLow JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNFileSysId i 1 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNFileSysMountPoint s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNFileSysSize u 9999 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNFileSysUsed u 9999 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNFileSysFree u 9999 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNFileSysUsedPr i 0

description: Id of the Compute Node.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysId

description: An unique identifier for the file system.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNFileSysId

description: The Filesystem path where the file system is mounted.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNFileSysMountPoint

description: Total storage capacity of the file system, in kilo bytes.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNFileSysSize

description: Used Storage capacity of the file system, in kilo bytes.

description: Unused Storage capacity of the file system, in kilo bytes.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNFileSysFree

description: Used Storage capacity of the file system, in percentage.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNFileSysUsedPr

description: This notification is generated whenever storage space recovers and
previously a jnxJVAECNStorageLow was reported.

event.Summary: Storage space on mount point $v3 recovered; Free space: $v6 kb

failure is detected.

description: This notification is generated whenever sensor reading is not within
the normal operating range.

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSensorAlert JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSysId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSensorId i 9999 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSensorValue s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSensorType i 0 JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSensorRange s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-NODE-MIB::jnxJVAECNSensorDesc s EXAMPLE
